name: Twinfold
description:
Twinfold delves into the duplicity of duplication. A roguelike about merging golden babies and squashing angry faces. Manipulate a labyrinthine tableau with the swipe of a finger. Merge and munch on golden babies level up and gain game-changing abilities.
- Thought-bending strategic gameplay
- Procedurally generated micro-puzzles
- Infinite replayability
- Over 40 unique skills
- 7 enemy types
- 6 well-thought-out bullet points
